languages.text:
Stasis field immediately recovers <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Cтазис-поле немедленно восстанавливает <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.
На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} персонаж теряет все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и получает +30% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}.

languages.text:
Stasisfeld stellt sofort <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wieder her.
Der Träger verliert alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, erhält aber 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +30 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.

languages.text:
Un champ de stase permet de récupérer immédiatement <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.
Il perd tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}, mais bénéficie de +30 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
récupère <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints} blessures{/g} à la place,
perd tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, mais gagne +30% à {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} pour 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Un champ de stase permet de récupérer immédiatement <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.
Il perd tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}, mais bénéficie de +30 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
静态立场立刻为装备者恢复<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
装备者会失去所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，但{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高30%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

装备者会失去所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，但{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高30%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text:
Campo de estasis recupera inmediatamente <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.
El portador pierde todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, pero obtiene +30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text:
<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を回復する。
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}すべてを失うが、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を30%獲得する。
